name: Soft blow wives
overview: Achyrachaena also known as blow wives are aptly named due to its silky white, single-seeded fruits ability to be carried in the wind. Blooms through April to May and is not endangered.
habitat: It is native to California's grasslands, woodlands, and wetlands. It can be found outside of California, but is confined to western North America.
tags: white yellow flower bud green plant plants
